title: Recovered Virgin
description: Mia: a hopeless virgin, a serial wanker, a desperate fantasizer who could not get rid of her shyness. Once she arrives in the big city â€“a city pullulated with infinite sex possibilities-, Mia begins to believe she finally can get what she deserves. It is the time. She can cure her disease; the virginity, and it can only be recovered by sexy men and seductive women.
author: Rosa K. Caballero
